wf_element_activity.input_transform:
{"source":"127.0.0.1","script_type":"file","command":"$Status = 'New report launched'
$reportID = '20603500'

$reportResult = New-Object -TypeName PSCustomObject
$reportResult | Add-Member -MemberType NoteProperty -Name "Status" -Value $Status -Force
$reportResult | Add-Member -MemberType NoteProperty -Name "ReportId" -Value $reportID -Force

$launchReportResults = New-Object PSCustomObject 
$launchReportResults | Add-Member -type NoteProperty -Name launchResult -Value $reportResult

$jsonLaunchReport = $launchReportResults | ConvertTo-Json 

Write-Host $jsonLaunchReport","midScriptFile":"9536d816db79bbc04ff2c553059619cf","powershellVariables":"[{"name":"qualysServer","type":"plain","value":"${activityInput.qualysServer}"},{"name":"qualysTemplateId","type":"plain","value":"${activityInput.qualysTemplateId}"},{"name":"userName","type":"plain","value":"${activityInput.userName}"},{"name":"password","type":"encrypted","value":"${activityInput.password}"}]","use_mid_service_account":"false","credential_tag":"","midCapabilities":"427709a60a0006bc7d2904e99132532d"}
wf_element_activity.name: cm_launchQualysReport
